description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nBig Boned:
At the start of battle, this creature gains Maximum {STAT_health} equal to 35% of its {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_defense}, and {STAT_speed}. Then, these stats are set to their minimum values.
name: Night Blade
